remarks: The set of polynomials is closed under multiplication, i.e. it is a subring of the set of power series.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jan-2015.)
statement:
mplsubg.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
mplsubg.p $e |- P = ( I mPoly R ) $.
mplsubg.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
mplsubg.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
mpllss.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mplsubrg $p |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
